Bring your reusable, non-glass, empty water bottle for free water throughout the day, available at the booths marked on the map.
Pick up a souvenir Sun God Festival water bottle at the merchandise booth for $5 (plastic) or $7 (aluminum) and refill it throughout the day for free.
Single-use cups are available at the water booths for $1 per cup. Due to health regulations, these cups cannot be refilled. We encourage you to buy or bring your own reusable bottle.
The \"About the Music\" Grant Program raises money for underdeveloped music programs in primary schools.
What would the Sun God Festival be without artists? Donate and help the next generation of musicians find their talent!

At last I could go no further; I was exhausted with the violence of my emotion and of my flight, and I staggered and fell by the wayside. That was near the bridge that crosses the canal by the gasworks. I fell and lay still.
